pages.text: æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆ Spring Boot2 æ•™ç¨‹åˆé›† .demo { background: transparent; padding: 2em 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; } .main-timeline { width: 80%; margin: 0px auto; margin-top: 20px !important; position: relative; } .main-timeline:before { content: ""; display: block; width: 2px; height: 100%; background: rgba(37, 48, 59, 0.7); margin: 0 0 0 -1px; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 50%; } .content h2:not(:first-child) { margin-top: 0px; } .main-timeline .timeline { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 20px; position: relative; border-left: 0px; margin-left: 0px; padding-left: 0px; } .main-timeline .timeline:after { content: ""; display: block; clear: both; } .main-timeline .timeline-content { width: 40%; float: left; margin: -10px 0 0 0; border-radius: 6px; } .timeline-content .description { border: 1px solid #dedede; } .main-timeline .date { display: block; width: 70px; height: 70px; line-height: 70px; border-radius: 50%; background: #25303b; padding: 0px 0; margin: 0 0 0 -36px; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 50%; font-size: 12px; font-weight: 900; text-transform: uppercase; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5); border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2); box-shadow: 0 0 0 7px #25303b; } .main-timeline .date span { display: block; text-align: center; } .main-timeline .day, .main-timeline .year { font-size: 10px; } .main-timeline .month { font-size: 18px; } .main-timeline .title { padding: 15px; margin: 0; font-size: 20px; color: #fff; text-transform: none; letter-spacing: -1px; border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0; position: relative; } .main-timeline .title:after { content: ""; width: 10px; height: 10px; position: absolute; top: 20px; right: -5px; transform: rotate(-45deg); } .main-timeline .description { padding: 15px; margin: 0; font-size: 14px; color: #656565; background: #fff; border-radius: 0 0 6px 6px; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(2n+2) .timeline-content { float: right; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(2n+2) .title:after { left: -5px; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+1) .title, .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+1) .title:after { background: #9f84c4; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+2) .title, .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+2) .title:after { background: #02a2dd; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+3) .title, .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+3) .title:after { background: #58b25e; } .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+4) .title, .main-timeline .timeline:nth-child(4n+4) .title:after { background: #eab715; } @media only screen and (max-width: 990px) { .main-timeline { width: 100%; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 767px) { .main-timeline:before, .main-timeline .date { left: 6%; } .main-timeline .timeline-content { width: 85%; float: right; } .main-timeline .title:after { left: -5px; } } @media only screen and (max-width: 480px) { .main-timeline:before, .main-timeline .date { left: 12%; } .main-timeline .timeline-content { width: 75%; } .main-timeline .date { width: 60px; height: 60px; margin-left: -30px; } .main-timeline .month { font-size: 14px; } } æºç ç¬”è®°(é¡ºåºå·²ç»æ•´ç†å¥½) 1 Tomcat8.5.50æºç ç¯å¢ƒæ­å»º 1. é¦–å…ˆåˆ°tomcatå®˜ç½‘ä¸‹è½½ src å’Œ éƒ¨ç½²åŒ…ã€‚...... å®Œ è°¢è°¢æµè§ˆï¼ test let els = document.getElementsByClassName("month"); for (let i = 0; i < els.length; i++) { els[i].innerHTML = i + 1; }

Interface1 {â€‹ void operation1();â€‹ void operation2();â€‹ void operation3();â€‹ void operation4();â€‹ void operation5();}public class B implements Interface1 {â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation1() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation1");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation2() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation2");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation3() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation3");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation4() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation4");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation5() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation5");â€‹ }}public class D implements Interface1 {â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation1() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation1");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation2() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation2");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation3() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation3");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void depend1(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation1();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend2(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation2();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend3(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation3();â€‹ }}public class C {â€‹ public void depend1(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation1();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend4(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation4();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend5(Interface1 inteface1){â€‹ inteface1.operation5();â€‹ }} æŒ‰ç…§æ¥å£éš”ç¦»åŸåˆ™åº”å½“å¦‚ä¸‹å¤„ç†ï¼š å°†æ¥å£Interface1æ‹†åˆ†æˆå‡ ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œæˆ‘ä»¬æ‹†åˆ†æˆ3ä¸ªæ¥å£ï¼‰ï¼Œç±»ï¼¡å’Œç±»ï¼£åˆ†åˆ«ä¸ä»–ä»¬éœ€è¦çš„æ¥å£å»ºç«‹ä¾èµ–å…³ç³»ã€‚ æ”¹é€ åï¼šæ”¹è¿›çš„UMLç±»å›¾å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š æ”¹è¿›åçš„ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š interface Interface1 {â€‹ void operation1();}public interface Interface2 {â€‹ void operation2();â€‹ void operation3();}public interface Interface3 {â€‹ void operation4();â€‹ void operation5();}public class B implements Interface1,Interface2 {â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation1() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation1");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation2() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation2");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation3() {â€‹ System.out.println("B å®ç°äº†operation3");â€‹ }}public class D implements Interface1,Interface3 {â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation1() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation1");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation4() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation4");â€‹ }â€‹ @Overrideâ€‹ public void operation5() {â€‹ System.out.println("D å®ç°äº†operation5");â€‹ }}public class A {â€‹ public void depend1(Interface1 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation1();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend2(Interface2 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation2();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend3(Interface2 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation3();â€‹ }}public class C {â€‹ public void depend1(Interface1 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation1();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend4(Interface3 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation4();â€‹ }â€‹ public void depend5(Interface3 inteface){â€‹ inteface.operation5();â€‹ }} a.depend3(new B());â€‹ C c = new C();â€‹ c.depend1(new D());//C ç±»é€šè¿‡æ¥å£å»ä¾èµ–(ä½¿ç”¨)Dâ€‹ c.depend4(new D());â€‹ c.depend5(new D());â€‹ }
